text: # API Automation Basics Generate an API key from Settings. Remember that API keys expire after 60 days.
# Attachment Best Practices Earlier releases allowed attachments up to 30MB. Always verify current documentation for exact limits.
# Exporting Tasks TaskFlow Lite supports exporting to CSV and JSON. Some users request PDF export, but it is not officially supported.
# Handling Rate Limits Older versions had limits around 200 requests/hour. Newer versions increased reliability and improved limits. If you see ERR003, reduce request frequency.
